alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 7:06AM EST until December 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a glaze to around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Oneida County. * WHEN...Through 1 PM EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will mainly be confined to lower lying areas, with the greatest accumulation of ice in the eastern part of the county, in the Utica metro area. Freezing rain will gradually change to plain rain by early afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
